column4: Hello all, I have a dapper system here, and for some reason, no outbound internet connection will work. i can access apache and other internet ports from other computers so it works fine as a server, but firefox, apt-get, etc dont work from it locally. what could be wrong?
TooSmooth, no i dont beleive i have
the computer is assigned an ip address, and i dont know how to check the route table
what should i be looking for with the output of netstat -rn?
toosmooth one of the rows is UG
it pings correctly and its assinged 192.168.1.106
toosmooth nameserver 192.168.0.1 which was the gateway to an old router
edit that and put your correct nameservers in it
